text:
*Theme Submission Bug:*
I've noticed during the past few times I've submitted theme updates that there is an issue with the release note character count and the ability to submit.  This happened again a moment ago.  Even though I had 39 characters left, the Submit Button wouldn't become active.  I had to deleted that lower list completely for it to work.  Just a heads up.

CC: <@U22PNRAJD> <@U01AS49TB0T> <@U2H3TT8F2>
Thanks for flagging this, I passed it along internally and we are taking a look at it.
